resources.string: Product Information: All Hardware is 316 “Marine-Grade” Stainless to resist corrosion. Authentic “non-repeating” wood grain patterns throughout the product. Impenetrable surface: so mold, mildew and bugs cannot penetrate the surface. No splintering, cracking or warping as with wood products. *Greater impact resistance than wood. Made with a minimum 95% Recycled Post-Consumer Content. No porosity, pinholes or pockmarks *Backed by the best warranty in the industry. This HDPE Lumber is ideal for use in outdoor furniture applications where weather-resistance, minimal maintenance and a premium appearance is required over a long product life cycle.
